mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (email, password, name, member_url) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{member_url})
mapper.select: SELECT email, password, name, member_url FROM member WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, member_url = #{member_url} WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
UPDATE member SET password = #{password} WHERE email = #{email}
